CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 6, 1962, pg. 2 reads: "Twist Winners - Richard and Idella Hatcher, children of Mrs. Gwendolyn Turner, 2407 Webster Ave., were tops among the scores of "Junior Twisters" at the contest held last week at the Civic Arena. They display plaques. - Harris Photo.'
TitMainTitle: Richard and Idella Hatcher holding World Twist Champion Junior Division Civic Arena December 29, 1961 plaques, posed in living room
